channel.title: I need help!
channel.description:
ok this might be stupid question but how am i supposed to change the servers name?i downloaded richscape v2 source and it says ''welcome to richscape'' but i want to change that name..i tryed to replace all ''richscape'' words in client.java but it still says ''welcome to richscape''..what should i edit?? (this is my 1st time making private servers so please keep comments like ''omfg noob'' to urself)
-Ty

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @co-own-darn co-own-darn

when you have dun tht have you went to compile ?

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You may have to replace it in other files as well as just the client class. However, another way would be to look through the code and replace them manually. Also make sure you are not finding them in a case sensitive mode (e.g. typing richscape may not find (and then replace) RichScape).

Read full topic

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @haxorpker haxorpker
item.description:
@haxorpker wrote:

ok this might be stupid question but how am i supposed to change the servers name?i downloaded richscape v2 source and it says ‘‘welcome to richscape’’ but i want to change that name…i tryed to replace all ‘‘richscape’’ words in client.java but it still says ‘‘welcome to richscape’’…what should i edit??
(this is my 1st time making private servers so please keep comments like ‘‘omfg noob’’ to urself)

-Ty
